title: Happy Birthday, Rin-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Happy Birthday, Rin-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ruby-chan! Thank you nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Kanata-san and the others are preparing a ramen party right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeeh!? Really!? Then let’s get going!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufu, hold on for a little bit, okay? You see, Ruby is in charge of dressing you up cute, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Dressing up? Me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s right! Look, Ruby made this culottes dress. Ruby thinks it’s perfect for you since you’re always so full of energy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Waaah~! It’s so pretty nya! Can Rin really wear this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Of course! There’s this tinted lip balm too! It’s popular in Aqours. Ruby will also put this on you, okay? Pucker up your lips!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hnn~.... Waaah, the color is really cute! Rin loves this color nya! Thank you, Ruby-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufu, you can save the thank you for later. Alright, let’s head to the party now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
